verses.verse: And it came to pass, <WH1961> when <WH834> all <WH3605> the people <WH1471> were clean <WH8552> passed over <WH5674> <WH853> Jordan, <WH3383> that the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> Joshua, <WH3091> saying, <WH559>
Take <WH3947> you twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> men <WH376> out of <WH4480> the people, <WH5971> out of every tribe a man, <WH376> <WH259> <WH376> <WH259> <WH4480> <WH7626>

And command <WH6680> ye them, saying, <WH559> Take <WH5375> you hence <WH4480> <WH2088> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> out of the place <WH4480> <WH4673> where the priests' <WH3548> feet <WH7272> stood firm, <WH3559> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones, <WH68> and ye shall carry them over <WH5674> <WH853> with <WH5973> you, and leave <WH5117> them in the lodging place, <WH4411> where <WH834> ye shall lodge <WH3885> this night. <WH3915>

Then Joshua <WH3091> called <WH7121> <WH413> the twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> men, <WH376> whom <WH834> he had prepared <WH3559> of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> out of every tribe a man: <WH376> <WH259> <WH376> <WH259> <WH4480> <WH7626>

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto them, Pass over <WH5674> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> into <WH413> the midst <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> and take ye up <WH7311> every man <WH376> of you a <WH259> stone <WH68> upon <WH5921> his shoulder, <WH7926> according unto the number <WH4557> of the tribes <WH7626> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478>

That <WH4616> this <WH2063> may be <WH1961> a sign <WH226> among <WH7130> you, that when <WH3588> your children <WH1121> ask <WH7592> their fathers in time to come, <WH4279> saying, <WH559> What <WH4100> mean ye by these <WH428> stones? <WH68>

Then ye shall answer <WH559> them, That <WH834> the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> were cut off <WH3772> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD; <WH3068> when it passed over <WH5674> Jordan, <WH3383> the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> were cut off: <WH3772> and these <WH428> stones <WH68> shall be <WH1961> for a memorial <WH2146> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> forever. <WH5704> <WH5769>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> so <WH3651> as <WH834> Joshua <WH3091> commanded, <WH6680> and took up <WH5375> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones <WH68> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Joshua, <WH3091> according to the number <WH4557> of the tribes <WH7626> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and carried them over <WH5674> with <WH5973> them unto <WH413> the place where they lodged, <WH4411> and laid them down <WH5117> there. <WH8033>

And Joshua <WH3091> set up <WH6965> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones <WH68> in the midst <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> in the place <WH8478> where the feet <WH7272> of the priests <WH3548> which bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> stood: <WH4673> and they are <WH1961> there <WH8033> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

For the priests <WH3548> which bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> stood <WH5975> in the midst <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> until <WH5704> every thing <WH3605> <WH1697> was finished <WH8552> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> Joshua <WH3091> to speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the people, <WH5971> according to all <WH3605> that <WH834> Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> Joshua: <WH3091> and the people <WH5971> hasted <WH4116> and passed over. <WH5674>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when <WH834> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> were clean <WH8552> passed over, <WH5674> that the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> passed over, <WH5674> and the priests, <WH3548> in the presence <WH6440> of the people. <WH5971>

And the children <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> and the children <WH1121> of Gad, <WH1410> and half <WH2677> the tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> passed over <WH5674> armed <WH2571> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> as <WH834> Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> them:

About forty <WH705> thousand <WH505> prepared <WH2502> for war <WH6635> passed over <WH5674> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> unto battle, <WH4421> to <WH413> the plains <WH6160> of Jericho. <WH3405>

On that <WH1931> day <WH3117> the LORD <WH3068> magnified <WH1431> <WH853> Joshua <WH3091> in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> Israel; <WH3478> and they feared <WH3372> him, as <WH834> they feared <WH3372> <WH853> Moses, <WH4872> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of his life. <WH2416>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> Joshua, <WH3091> saying, <WH559>
Command <WH6680> <WH853> the priests <WH3548> that bear <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the testimony, <WH5715> that they come up <WH5927> out of <WH4480> Jordan. <WH3383>
Joshua <WH3091> therefore commanded <WH6680> <WH853> the priests, <WH3548> saying, <WH559> Come ye up <WH5927> out of <WH4480> Jordan. <WH3383>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when the priests <WH3548> that bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> were come up <WH5927> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of Jordan, <WH3383> and the soles <WH3709> of the priests' <WH3548> feet <WH7272> were lifted up <WH5423> unto <WH413> the dry land, <WH2724> that the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> returned <WH7725> unto their place, <WH4725> and flowed <WH1980> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> his banks, <WH1415> as <WH8543> they did before. <WH8032>

And the people <WH5971> came up <WH5927> out of <WH4480> Jordan <WH3383> on the tenth <WH6218> day of the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> and encamped <WH2583> in Gilgal, <WH1537> in the east <WH4217> border <WH7097> of Jericho. <WH3405>
And those <WH428> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones, <WH68> which <WH834> they took <WH3947> out of <WH4480> Jordan, <WH3383> did Joshua <WH3091> pitch <WH6965> in Gilgal. <WH1537>

And he spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> When <WH834> your children <WH1121> shall ask <WH7592> <WH853> their fathers <WH1> in time to come, <WH4279> saying, <WH559> What <WH4100> mean these <WH428> stones? <WH68>
Then ye shall let <WH853> your children <WH1121> know, <WH3045> saying, <WH559> Israel <WH3478> came over <WH5674> <WH853> this <WH2088> Jordan <WH3383> on dry land. <WH3004>

For <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> dried up <WH3001> <WH853> the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> you, until <WH5704> ye were passed over, <WH5674> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> did <WH6213> to the Red <WH5488> sea, <WH3220> which <WH834> he dried up <WH3001> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> us, until <WH5704> we were gone over: <WH5674>

That <WH4616> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> might know <WH3045> <WH853> the hand <WH3027> of the LORD, <WH3068> that <WH3588> it <WH1931> is mighty: <WH2389> that <WH4616> ye might fear <WH3372> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> forever. <WH3605> <WH3117>
